channel.title: Road Trips
channel.description:
What things do you do to pass time while you're on a long drive? I'm about to go on a 4 hour drive to my grandma's then pick my friend up from the airport, Just need some things to do in the car!
P.S. I will be the only one in the car.
P.S.S. Masturbating furiously is not an option. lol

item.title: Road Trips
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

Frell:

try not to get your clothes tangled and then get a boner. It sucks.

leather seats + back sweat = worse

Edit: Thanks for somewhat of the tips guys I’m leaving now… so. Porn, and music here I come!

Read full topic

[/quote]

I usually just sleep, try to find a comfy position in the car and just close your eyes.[/quote]
